title: Nightmare Cho'Gath removed?
body: I just recently logged back into LoL then realized.  My beloved Nightmare Cho'Gath skin was gone.

replies.body: Is it simply missing from your collection page or are you also having issues selecting it in champ select?
It's like it no longer exists in the skin collection.

Sometimes the *beta client* can have issues displaying the content you own. Are you **also** having issues selecting it if you hop into a custom match, or is it simply not pulling up in your collections?
I go to skins section both in the lobby and in the champions skin list in store and it's not there
If you got it from hextech crafting, did you redeem it as a trial, or did you use essence?

I got it from Hextech.  I also got toxic mundo and the blackthorn morgana from Hextech.
I just logged in one day to play cho gath and noticed the nightmare skin was gone.
Would there happen to be logs of what skins I was using during a match lol.

I took a look at your account and don't see any record of the skin being on your account. If you have any further details regarding when and how you obtained the skin, feel free to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and one of our account specialists will investigate further.
: ( That's my favorite Cho'Gath skin by a longshot. I fucking love it.
